metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4194 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Accessibility in Google Chrome prior to 108.0.5359.71allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
